sentences.sentence: Sheweishan gold deposit is a large-scale laterite-type deposit first found in Hubei Province of China.
sentences.translation: 蛇屋山金矿床是我国首先在湖北省发现并探明的大型红土型金矿床。

sentences.sentence: All engineering characteristics of Guilin laterite were completely depended on the forming environment of the laterite.
sentences.translation: 桂林红土的这些工程地质特征主要由其特殊的成土环境条件所决定。

sentences.sentence: This paper analyses the substance compositing of the basalt laterite section, based on site investigation the basalt laterite in Kunming area.
sentences.translation: 在对昆明某地玄武岩红土进行现场勘察的基础上，对其剖面的物质组成取样进行了研究。
